GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.16.10
GSD.description:
SUNRPC: lock against ->sock changing during sysfs read

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.10 by commit 9482ab4540f5bcc869b44c067ae99b5fca16bd07, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 17f09d3f619a7ad2d2b021b4e5246f08225b1b0f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: SUNRPC: lock against ->sock changing during sysfs read
